adjectives.description: seaworn (comparative more seaworn, superlative most seaworn)

entries.meaning: Smoothed or worn away gradually by the action of the sea.
examples: With Waltham, and the Bere, that on the Sea-worne shore
See at the Southerne Iles the Tides at tilt to runne;
